transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi good morning sir. Main Humera baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se. Kaise ho sir aap?
Customer: Theek hai apna sunao.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Badhiya hai sir. Badhiya hai badhiya hai. Sir iske liye connect kiya tha aapko maine. Sir service aapne us din call cut kar diya kuch bhi discussion bhi nahi kiya completely. Main wahi keh rahi thi service ke liye ki kya problem kya aa rahi hai service ko leke. Kya dikkat aa rahi hai. Kyunki aap continue ke liye keh rahe ho baar baar is wajah se maine connect kiya aapko ek baar main kaha baat karti hun sir se kya problem hai kya karna hai. Kyunki wahi cheez hai na sir ki apni services chal rahi hai achi khasi. Uske lekin aap phir aage keh rahe ho ki dikkat aa rahi hai. To aap batao phir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Maine refund ke bare mein bola tha.
Executive: Main wahi keh rahi hun sir but kya problem kya hai is cheez mein deactivation ka dimag mein aapke kyun aaya hai service ko leke. Ab agar aap ek cheez socho agar aapka business sahi chal raha hai ya phir aapka usme profit ho ja raha hai lead convert ho ja rahi hai kyunki aapne soch samajh ke to service li hongi. 12 mahine pehle bhi thi to hai na 12 mahine ki thi haan chalo mere ko business karna hai. Ab agar aap koi service hai to uske alawa koi aur bhi to business kar rahe hoge service chala rahe hoge aage. Aise promotion chal raha hai achi services hai to usko close karna to sahi decision nahi hai sir.
Customer: Are maine business close kar diya yaar. Ek hi ek hi baat ko aap log puchti rehti hai kya problem kya dikkat. Ab main bol raha hun business close ho gaya to dikkat kya ho.
Executive: Aap ek cheez batao GST aapka active hai. Plus uske alawa aap aur bhi to koi kaam kar rahe hoge products wagera ka sabhi tarah ke.
Customer: [inaudible] nahi kar rahe yaar hatao yaar.
Executive: Ek cheez hai.
Customer: Aap refund karo na baat khatam hai. Sir meri ek baar baat suniye sir main kya keh rahi hun aapko pata hai kya hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Aap ek cheez dekho aap abhi maine check kiya tha aap subah bhi price dekh rahe the TrustSeal ka aur uski services ko leke. Aur ab aap dusri side ye keh rahe hain ki aap service nahi chala rahe hain ya business band ho gaya hai. Aur GST aapka active hai. To sir kaise band hua hai aapka business active GST mein.
Customer: Band ho jayega GST bhi jab business band ho jayega GST bhi band hoga sab process mein hai.
Executive: Hello. Theek hai aap refund kijiye wo sab chodiye ye active wo active falana active dimag kharab hai.
Executive: Sir is tarah se is tarah se aap keh rahe hain is tarah se to nahi ho pata hai na aap khud bhi to sochiye achanak se call karke aap aise kahenge decision ke liye to ye koi tarika thodi hota hai.
Customer: Fir kya tarika hota hai abhi bata dijiye wahi tarika apna lenge. Business band ho gaya to ye tarika nahi wo tarika nahi.
Customer: Theek hai okay aap refund kijiye baat khatam kijiye.
Customer: Samajh rahi hai na.
Executive: Main aapki baat sun rahi hun sir but ek baat aap ye dekhiye ki achanak se is tarah se to nahi ho pata hai na.
Customer: Are yaar aapke IndiaMART se koi fayda hota nahi hai itna dimag kahe laga rahi hai aap. Aapke IndiaMART se ek bhi nahi fayda hua. Main fayde ka yahi wahi yahi to main jaanna chah rahi hun ki fayde ki agar baat hai ya business milne ki baat hai to usme to hum aapki help kar sakte hain na. Ki aapka business kaise chal raha hai aage kaise work ho sakta hai nahi ho sakta hai.
Customer: Business mera hai aur help aap kijiye.
Executive: Bilkul agar suniye suniye meri baat suniye sir agar business nahi convert ho raha hai ya service nahi ho rahi hai aap jis product line mein kaam karte hain na medical ki aur products mein usme aaram se business generate hota hai aur aapki hi services mein aapke aas pass bahut sare competitor hain jo isi mein deal kar rahe hain aap sochiye agar business nahi ho raha hota ya profit nahi hota to baki ke aur bhi market mein log invest to nahi karte aur khas taur pe IndiaMART pe nahi invest karte right ye bhi to cheez hai na.
Customer: [inaudible] suniye na jisko profit ho raha hai wo kar raha hai humko profit nahi hai hum band kar rahe hain baat khatam hai aap refund kijiye. Jyada dimag mat chatiye mera. Waise hi mood kharab rehta hai.
Executive: Baat ye nahi hai. Theek hai suniye sir aap shant ho jaiye pehle to. And plus ek cheez aapko main bataun is tarah se na.
Customer: Are yaar hum shant hi hai zindagi mein ek yahi kaam nahi hai aapse baat karta rahega aadmi. Koi bhi IndiaMART wala phone karta tha aadha ghanta se kam uski baat hi nahi khatam hoti hai. Saale ghuma fira ke idhar se udhar udhar se udhar udhar se udhar karta rehta hai.
Executive: But aap ye bhi to dekho sir aapki hum to aapka customer hai to hum customer ki to problem samjhenge hi na.
Customer: Are yaar meri baat suno na hatao dafa karo.
Executive: Boliye main sun rahi hun.
Customer: Business kar diye hain aap refund kijiye aur baat khatam kijiye ye sab. Dobara call nahi kijiyega humko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer states business is closed.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to understand the issue.

- Executive explained the benefits of the subscription.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business closure, gst
